import React,{Component} from 'react'; import { Modal, Button, Row, Col, Form, Image } from 'react-bootstrap'; import pic from "../public/returnForm.jpg"; export class ReturnForm extends Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { image: pic } this.handleSubmit = this.handleSubmit.bind(this); this.handleFileSelected = this.handleFileSelected.bind(this); } handleFileSelected(event) { event.preventDefault(); this.state.image = event.target.files[0]; } handleSubmit(event) { event.preventDefault(); } render(){ return (

) } }
